name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Property insights for Rightmove and Zoopla

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds insights for properties on rightmove.co.uk and zoopla.co.uk.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
See all the important information about an area of a property on rightmove.co.uk and zoopla.co.uk!
The extension adds information about the property and area to for a better educated choice over renting or buying a house.
